Header: Troops of Mechanized Infantry Support to Clean Garbage
Content: Mechanized Infantry Regiment (MIR) troops launched a cleaning programme in the ‘Rangiri Dambulla’ temple premises on Sunday (10) under the guidance of Brigadier Sumith Atapattu, Colonel of the Regiment, MIR and Director Media of Sri Lanka Army. The close supervision of Colonel S.J Priyadarshana, Centre Commandant, MIR carried out the work to suit the concept, ‘Environment is Sacred’. Regimental Staff members on the following day (11) organized an alms-giving for 15 monks including Ven Ambagaswewa Rahula Thero, Chief Incumbent of Rangiri Dambulu Temple to invoke blessings on the Mechanized Infantry Regiment.
